element.name: Rotkin

description.p: The secretive race of ratfolk known as the Rotkin inhabit Mudflat Village. While their interests align with those of the other animalfolk in fighting against the Calamity Beasts, they do things in their own peculiar manner. Their seclusion and general reluctance to deal with outsiders often makes it difficult for allies, let alone enemies, to make contact with them when their services are needed.

Subtle and cunning. Rotkin rely most heavily on their innate psychic powers. They use such powers in attempts to influence others so that the tides of events turn in their favor. They nonetheless maintain a firm alignment with good. Using their talents to bring the hidden truths to light, they navigate the complex Calamity movement.

There are primarily two roles amongst the Rotkin: Inquisitors, who use their psychic magic to wring out information, and Sneaks, who do it with stealth and cunning. From merely overhearing crucial conversations to revealing damning evidence, the Rotkin have become integral to the process from revealing the plans of those bent upon threatening their world.

Though Rotkin society is very egalitarian, meaning all of its members are considered to be equal regardless of role, from a skilled psychic to the stealthy rogue and to a caretaker whose role is to ensure the well-being of the community, every Rotkin is equally valued. But then, they do not really take pleasure in being too social, speaking to each other only if need be. That is independence and individual self-sufficiency for the people who can thrive in isolation in this village setting but keep watch for the ever-presence of the Calamity Beasts.
Most Rotkin are very similar but there are occasional differences, but your Rotkin has these traits.

Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity, Intelligence, or Constitution increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.
Age. Rotkin mature quickily, reaching adulthood around 5 years old. They live up to 50 years.
Alignment. Most Rotkin are neutral, with some leaning toward good, always disliking evil in their unique way.
Size. Rotkin are considered small creatures, no more than 4 feet tall
Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Darkvision You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Information Gatherer Choose one of the following skills: Insight or Stealth. You have proficiency in the chosen skill.
Unbreakable Will You have advantage on Wisdom saving throws against spells and other magical effects. Additionally, you have resistance to Psychic damage.
Mindwhisk As a bonus action, you momentarily diminish your enemies' talents. Every creature within a 15-foot cone originating from you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Dexterity or Intelligence modifier, your choice when you select this race). For the next minute, if a creature that failed the save would deal damage for the first time in a turn, that damage is reduced by your level + your Proficiency bonus ( if multiple instances of damage are present, only one of them is reduced). You must concentrate on this effect as if concentrating on a spell. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all uses after a long rest. Whenever you succeed on an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw, you can regain one expended use of this feature.
Languages You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

description.p: Your thoughts cannot be read by any means unless you allow it. Additionally, no matter what you say, magic that would determine if you are telling the truth indicates that you are being truthful.
